attributes.action: protection from from cowboy customers in the construction trade!
attributes.additional_details: I have personally been the victim of un fair treatment and have suffered unlawfully. I want to stop this happening to genuine honest building companies. I want action
attributes.background: Protect the honest British builders and tradesmen from criminal activity in the form of minipulation of goverment bodies I.e trading standards to use as leverage against small business

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you are concerned about unlawful practices in construction but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
Law enforcement is a matter for the police and the courts. If you believe a crime has been committed, you should contact the police:
https://www.gov.uk/contact-police
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
